channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ポッドキャスティングの市場調整が進む中、大スターは依然として8桁や9桁の契約を結んでいるが、一方で平社員は労働組合の保護を求めている（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Amid a market correction in podcasting, the biggest stars still get eight- and nine-figure contracts, while rank-and-file employees push for union protections  —  While mega-deals come roaring back, rank-and-file podcasters are seeking basic labor protections  —  Welcome back to Soundbite.

item.title: BBC Studiosが英放送局ITVのストリーミング配信会社BritBox Internationalの株式50％を2億5500万ポンドで買収、ITVは広告収入によるストリーミング配信サービスITVXに注力（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
BBC Studios buys British broadcaster ITV's 50% stake in streamer BritBox International for £255M, as ITV focuses on its ad-funded streaming service ITVX  —  The streamer was founded in 2017 as a joint venture between BBC Studios, which is the commercial arm of the British broadcaster, and ITV.

item.title: メタ社、2024年4月初旬に米国とオーストラリアでFacebook Newsタブを廃止し、これらの国における従来のニュースコンテンツとの契約を停止する計画（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Meta plans to deprecate the Facebook News tab in the US and Australia in early April 2024 and stop signing deals for traditional news content in those countries  —  Meta Platforms Inc. is winding down its news feature in the US and Australia, part of a broader shift away from the category for the social media giant.

item.title: 米連邦地裁判事、キャサリン・ヘリッジを民事侮辱罪で拘束 FBIが調査する科学者に関するFoxニュースの記事について情報源を明かすことを拒否したため（AP通信）。
item.description:
Associated Press:
A US district judge holds Catherine Herridge in civil contempt for refusing to divulge her source for Fox News stories about a scientist investigated by the FBI  —  A federal judge held veteran investigative reporter Catherine Herridge in civil contempt on Thursday for refusing to divulge …

item.title: CNETがAIを使って記事を作成した後、Wikipedia編集者はCNETのソース信頼性評価を下げ、他のRed Venturesアウトレットの信頼性について議論している（Maggie Harrison Dupré/Futurism）
item.description:
Maggie Harrison Dupré / Futurism:
Wikipedia editors lowered CNET's source reliability rating after CNET used AI to create articles and are discussing reliability of other Red Ventures outlets  —  Remember last year, when we reported that the Red Ventures-owned CNET had been quietly publishing dozens of AI-generated articles …

item.title: 先に発表されたように、TechCrunchは3月1日にTechCrunch+の有料購読を終了し、これまで有料だった記事はすべて一般公開される（Jacquelyn Melinek/@jacqmelinek）
item.description:
Jacquelyn Melinek / @jacqmelinek:
As announced earlier, TechCrunch ends paid subscriptions for TechCrunch+ on March 1, and all previously paywalled articles will be publicly available  —  Reminder: TechCrunch is ending its subscription-based TechCrunch+ This means all previously paywalled articles will be publicly available as of March 1

item.title: トランプ・メディアの共同設立者が、トランプ氏らが自分たちの持ち株比率を薄めようとしたとして提訴、トランプ・メディアのSPAC合併が複雑化する可能性も（Drew Harwell/Washington Post）
item.description:
Drew Harwell / Washington Post:
Co-founders of Trump Media file a suit claiming Trump and others tried to dilute their stake in the company; the case could complicate Trump Media's SPAC merger  —  The case could complicate a long-delayed bid by the owner of Truth Social to go public — and deliver former president Donald Trump a financial lifeline

item.title: 2011年にMailchimpに買収されたニュースレターツール「TinyLetter」は、インターネット上の素晴らしい個人的な文章を育んできたが、短期間で閉鎖されることになった（Kevin Nguyen/The Verge）。
item.description:
Kevin Nguyen / The Verge:
A eulogy for TinyLetter, as the newsletter tool acquired by Mailchimp in 2011 shuts down after a brief run nurturing great personal writing on the internet  —  In remembrance of the humblest newsletter service and its brief run nurturing great personal writing on the internet.

item.title: ネクスター・メディア・グループが第5巡回区控訴裁判所に対し、テレビ局所有に制限を設ける長年の規則を支持したFCCの決定を見直すよう要請（マシュー・キーズ／デスク）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Nexstar Media Group asks the 5th Circuit Court of Appeals to review the FCC's decision to uphold a long-standing rule setting limits on TV station ownership  —  Nexstar Media Group has asked a federal court to review a recent Federal Communications Commission (FCC) decision that limits …

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙のテイラー・ロレンツは、インターネットとテック業界を形作るトレンドについて毎週Vox Mediaが配信するビデオポッドキャスト「Power User」を3月21日に開始する（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The Washington Post's Taylor Lorenz is launching Power User, a weekly Vox Media video podcast on trends shaping the internet and tech landscape, on March 21  —  - Earlier this month, Vox Media announced that acclaimed author and podcaster Brené Brown will be bringing her two award-winning shows …

item.title: 情報筋
item.description:
Charlotte Klein / Vanity Fair:
Sources: NYT managers launched a leak probe after The Intercept revealed internal debate over a yet-to-air episode of The Daily about Hamas and sexual violence  —  Management has questioned staffers, including Daily producers, after The Intercept revealed internal debate over a yet-to-air episode on Hamas weaponizing sexual violence.

item.title: 中小企業がストリーミングサービスで動画広告を購入できるセルフサービス・プラットフォームのVibe.coは、Singularが主導する2,250万ドルのシリーズAを調達し、資金調達総額は〜3,000万ドルに達した（Alyssa Boyle/AdExchanger）
item.description:
Alyssa Boyle / AdExchanger:
Vibe.co, a self-serve platform that lets SMBs buy video ads on streaming services, raised a $22.5M Series A led by Singular, bringing its total funding to ~$30M  —  Small and midsize businesses (SMBs) want to capitalize on the rise in streaming consumption but lack the budgets for upfront commitments.

item.title: 10月7日、ハマスが性暴力を武器化したとする物議を醸したNYTの報道は、報道経験のない元イスラエル情報将校に大きく依存していた（The Intercept）
item.description:
The Intercept:
A controversial NYT report claiming Hamas weaponized sexual violence on Oct. 7 relied heavily on an ex-Israeli intelligence officer with no reporting experience  —  American Media Keep Citing Zaka — Though Its October 7 Atrocity Stories Are Discredited in Israel

item.description:
Associated Press:
Russia detains Novaya Gazeta EIC Sergei Sokolov for allegedly discrediting Russian army; he became EIC in 2023 after Dmitry Muratov was named a “foreign agent”  —  The editor-in-chief of the renowned Russian independent newspaper Novaya Gazeta was detained in Moscow on Thursday …

item.description:
Kim Bellware / Washington Post:
